timeline.name: Core System Foundations & User Management
goals: Establish backend infrastructure and development workflow
Implement full user authentication and checkbox-based access system (per-project)
Lay groundwork for project management features
technical_setup: Project scaffolding (repo setup, Docker, CI/CD pipeline)
Environment configuration (.env, secrets management, staging/production separation)

modules.name: User Management & Authentication
features: Secure login with JWT-based or session authentication
Enabling RLS and project permission settings
Assign users to projects with custom roles and permissions

modules.name: Project Setup
features: Project entity definition and API endpoints
Project creation with defined stages (customizable per project)
Assigning users and defining roles/permissions per project
Attach documents, videos, and project details during setup

modules.name: Frontend UI
features: Basic form validation and error handling

deliverables: Source code pushed with modular structure
Working user auth flows on staging

timeline.name: Project Management, Documents, Tasks & Dashboard
goals: Implement core modules: project tracking, task management, and document handling

modules.name: Project Management Features
features: Metadata tagging (e.g., project type, location, status)
Status transitions (e.g., initiated, in progress, completed)
Project-specific update section to attach updates with documents and videos

modules.name: Task Management
features: Task dependencies and critical path calculation

modules.name: Document & Media Management
features: Secure file upload for PDFs, Images, DOCX, and Videos
Categorization and tagging by project and stage
Video upload with streaming capability for site update reports

modules.name: Dashboard Functionality
features: Real-time overview widgets (active projects, pending tasks)
Quick links to documents, videos, and tasks

modules.name: Frontend UI
features: Document and video center interface with preview support

deliverables: User stories mapped with UI elements

timeline.name: Communication, Reporting, AI Agent MVP, Payment & Mobile Readiness
goals: Develop reporting tools and analytics dashboard
Implement payment gateway integration with Stripe
Prepare for mobile responsiveness and offline features

modules.name: Communication Features
features: Comment threads on tasks and documents
Meeting notes and media uploads (including videos)

modules.name: AI Agent (Prototype)
features: Voice-based interface using Twilio or Dialogflow
Voice prompts to workers for status collection
Dashboard update based on verbal inputs

modules.name: Payment Integration
features: Integration with Stripe for project billing and payment collection
Create plans, track usage, and manage billing history
Secure payment links and invoice support
Admin overview of payment status per project

deliverables: AI prototype connected to voice gateway (Twilio)
Stripe payment system live and functional
System performance benchmarks and optimization report
Complete staging deployment for testing and feedback

final_deliverables.product: ConstructPro SaaS MVP: Fully operational cloud-hosted solution
